ai-thag3.12:1.1_0: I was, indeed, an astute scholar,
ai-thag3.12:1.2_0: competent to think on the meaning.
ai-thag3.12:1.3_0: The five kinds of sensual stimulation in the world,
ai-thag3.12:2.2_0: I was struck by a powerful dart.
ai-thag3.12:2.3_0: But I was able to free myself
ai-thag3.12:2.4_0: from the trap laid by the King of Death.
ai-thag3.12:3.1_0: I have given up all sensual pleasures;
ai-thag3.12:3.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
